__e: I'm wondering, is there something wrong with me, Father?
Makes me wonder if there was anyone left to sit.
I wonder what it takes to earn your trust.
One wonders if he even has a surprise witness at all.
I wonder if you remember a man, though he may have died long ago.
I wonder if we'll ever go too far.
They had to get rid of me, and no wonder.
I know you are, which makes me wonder why you'd want to throw all that hard work away.
Makes you wonder how Earth-2 Lois Lane managed to put up with such a colossal tool.
Now I wonder every hour of my life... why God put me into this chair.
And for the first time I begin to wonder, what's it like out there, on the other side, in the real world?
I wondered how they would have felt... if each time their husband went in to make a deal... there was a one in four chance he wouldn't come out of the meeting.
After you leave, I'll have to sit here all my life and wonder what happened to me, if anything.
Do you ever look at someone and wonder... "What is going on inside their head?"
So, what I have been wondering is why your State Department would send someone here who thinks he understands the problem.
I'm intrigued to know why you've brought me all this way.
I wonder, why haven't we seen any animals?
